public boolean isin1v1(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3520) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) { return true; } if(PlayerId != playerId && PlayerId != 0) { sendMessage("That player is already in combat."); attackingPlayerId = 0; ResetAttack(); break; } } }
